## Deployment notes (critical)

- Frontend is **Vercel**, backend is **Render**.
- If this change affects API calls, confirm whether the UI uses:
  - Render FastAPI endpoints via `NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL`, or
  - Next.js API routes under `frontend/app/api/`
